original: a'arya ya m'anta ka s'a dha nam /
analyzed: a'arya ya m'anta ka s'a dha nam /

original: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs /
analyzed: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs /

original: 'phags pa khro bo gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags pa khro bo gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the noble wrathful Yamāri.

original: de bzhin du aom h'um zhes bya ba'i sa bon las bskyed la /
analyzed: de bzhin du aom h'um zhes bya ba'i sa bon las bskyed la /
translated: Similarly, generated from the seed syllable Oṃ Hūṃ,

original: khro bo'i skyil krung gis nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um las byung ba'i gshin rje gshed rab tu khros pa /
analyzed: khro bo'i skyil krung gis nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um las byung ba'i gshin rje gshed rab tu khros pa /
translated: Yamāri arises from the sun, standing on Hūṃ, in the wrathful posture,

original: zhal drug pa phyag drug pa /
analyzed: zhal drug pa phyag drug pa /
translated: with six faces and six arms.

original: dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa /
analyzed: dbu skra gyen du brdzes pa /

original: ma he la chibs pa g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
analyzed: ma he la chibs pa g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
translated: He rides a water buffalo, standing with his left leg extended.

original: mi'i thod pa dang rgyu mas brgyan pa /
analyzed: mi'i thod pa dang rgyu mas brgyan pa /
translated: He is adorned with human skulls and intestines.

original: shin tu 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can /
analyzed: shin tu 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can /
translated: He has a very frightening appearance.

original: stag gi pags pa'i smad g-yogs can /🔽phyag g-yas na ral gri dang rdo rje bsnams pa /
analyzed: stag gi pags pa'i smad g-yogs can / phyag g-yas na ral gri dang rdo rje bsnams pa /
translated: He wears a tiger-skin skirt.🔽In his right hands he holds a sword and a vajra.

original: g-yon na dril bu dang / rdo rje gtun shing bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon na dril bu dang / rdo rje gtun shing bsnams pa /
translated: In his left hands he holds a bell and a vajra-cudgel.

original: cod pan mi bskyod pas mtshan pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: cod pan mi bskyod pas mtshan pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: He is imagined to be marked with Akṣobhya on his crown.

original: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste /
translated: Then one should bind the pledge seal.

original: thal mo khong stong du sbyar la mthe bong gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis so sor phye la gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa bcag par bya'o //🔽aom hr'i:shtr'i:bikri @264a * //
analyzed: thal mo khong stong du sbyar la mthe bong gnyis dang mdzub mo gnyis so sor phye la gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum pa bcag par bya'o // aom hr'i:shtr'i:bikri @264a * //
translated: One should join the palms hollow and open the two thumbs and two index fingers, and one should bend the third joint of the two middle fingers.

original: t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
analyzed: t'a na na h'um h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ hṛiḥ śrīḥ vikṛtānanā hana hana hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ svāhā.

original: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: 'phags pa gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The means of accomplishing Ārya Yamāri is complete.
